channel.title: Take the twitter feed off the main page
channel.description: It just makes the dev's look neglectful at best, secretive failures at worse. Either start posting fresh updates to the twitter or get rid of it, all it'd doing is signalling the long ago death of the mod, true or not as that is.

item.title: Take the twitter feed off the main page
item.dc:creator: Hubicorn
item.description:
Back to the topic at hand. The twitter feed removal nor any further changes will not be done to the current website as I stated before. Therefore, this topic has been locked.

Thanks for the suggestions however.

Read full topic
item.source: Take the twitter feed off the main page

item.source: Take the twitter feed off the main page

item.title: Take the twitter feed off the main page
item.dc:creator: HawkeyE
item.description:
Hubicorn:

https://lambdageneration.com/posts/black-mesa-sources-soundtrack-to-be-released-alongside-website-redesign-soon-enough-mod-release-to-follow-14-days-afterwards/

This is why we cannot have nice things. Let me rephrase this very carefully.

Remember! Always take anything discussed on these community forums, if not coming from our team leader directly, with a large grain of salt.
Any official announcements will be made by the modification team leader directly in this section on the forums: https://forums.blackmesasource.com/forumdisplay.php?f=2

Regardless if it’s a quote from me, or another developer on the team throwing the word “soon” freely, any announcement will be properly conducted. We just simply care and thank everyone for the ongoing support on this project and want to relay the message that we are not dead.

Thanks for that.

Read full topic
item.source: Take the twitter feed off the main page

item.title: Take the twitter feed off the main page
item.dc:creator: Zuul
item.description:
whoaaa…you’ve got your knickers all in a twist there buddy…Allthough I admire your commitment to this mod…but geez…really?

anything but a straight answer from the devs is pure bullsquid

like the hl3 thingy…1+1+1=3 come on!..

I could just asw easily prove the existance of God by counting the number of times Jehova witnesess knock on my door…if it’s in bulk, it must be true

Read full topic

item.title: Take the twitter feed off the main page
item.dc:creator: Hubicorn
item.description:
Scared:

That post has gotten significantly less attention than I expected it would have considering the implications…

https://lambdageneration.com/posts/black-mesa-sources-soundtrack-to-be-released-alongside-website-redesign-soon-enough-mod-release-to-follow-14-days-afterwards/

This is why we cannot have nice things. Let me rephrase this very carefully.

Remember! Always take anything discussed on these community forums, if not coming from our team leader directly, with a large grain of salt.
Any official announcements will be made by the modification team leader directly in this section on the forums: https://forums.blackmesasource.com/forumdisplay.php?f=2

Regardless if it’s a quote from me, or another developer on the team throwing the word “soon” freely, any announcement will be properly conducted. We just simply care and thank everyone for the ongoing support on this project and want to relay the message that we are not dead.

Read full topic
item.source: Take the twitter feed off the main page

item.title: Take the twitter feed off the main page
item.dc:creator: Keresh
item.description:
Hubicorn:

It was said that once the soundtrack is released, one could expect the launch of black mesa two weeks after. I can now say that a new website will be launched with the soundtrack in preparation for the mod. Fuck if we care about the current website. Just take a good look at it because it will be gone soon enough.

“12 months later…” amirite?

Read full topic

item.title: Take the twitter feed off the main page
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
I’m going to be moving to California on February 1st (or thereabouts) and I will be offline for a good month or two. I just know when I get back online that you guys will have released Black Mesa while I’m gone and I’ll be at the back of the pack.

Fuck you. Fuck you all.

Read full topic
